system: caffeine C8H10N4O2, neutral singlet, gas phase
geometry_freq: ωB97X-D/def2-TZVP TightOpt Grid5 RIJCOSX def2/J TightSCF
notes: EBO = FINAL SINGLE POINT ENERGY (includes Enn; do not add again).
E0 = EBO + ZPE (report unscaled and scaled if space allows).
G(298) = EBO + G(thermal) from the frequency job.
Single-reference character excellent: T1 ~ 0.014–0.017; D1 ~ 0.045–0.058; all harmonic freqs real.
TightPNO − NormalPNO ΔE typically 0.0003–0.0013 Ha (~0.2–0.8 kcal/mol).
Uncertainty (fixed protocol): ±0.01–0.02 Ha on EBO; ±0.002–0.004 Ha on ZPE.
Scaled ZPE lowers E0 by ≈0.002–0.003 Ha with central values.
